Prison violence: Whiu Te Aramakutu led to cells swearing after learning how long he will be in jail https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prison-violence-whiu-te-aramakutu-led-to-cells-swearing-after-learning-how-long-he-will-be-in-jail/ HT4IAC7MSVFHBBBRHLNCKPQBOI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prison-violence-whiu-te-aramakutu-led-to-cells-swearing-after-learning-how-long-he-will-be-in-jail/ HT4IAC7MSVFHBBBRHLNCKPQBOI/ Ric StevensVictims included an innocent householder, a prison guard, a policewoman and two inmates. Fri, 10 May 2024 08:00:00 +0000 Whiu Te Aramakutu assaulted a prison guard and a police officer as he was being taken into Whanganui Prison. Photo / Bevan Conley
KiwiRail mega ferries: What Labour Finance Minister Grant Robertson knew about financial troubles https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwirail-mega-ferries-what-labour-finance-minister-grant-robertson-knew-about-financial-troubles/NHKEPQDVWBAYJF7IS7UCT2TDNM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwirail-mega-ferries-what-labour-finance-minister-grant-robertson-knew-about-financial-troubles/NHKEPQDVWBAYJF7IS7UCT2TDNM/ Georgina CampbellTense letters between Grant Robertson and KiwiRail's chairman have been revealed. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Havelock North kidnapping: Adam Wardle jailed for two years, 11 months https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/havelock-north-kidnapping-adam-wardle-jailed-for-two-years-11-months/OXZPLREVJRH6PFH555QECMNO3Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/havelock-north-kidnapping-adam-wardle-jailed-for-two-years-11-months/OXZPLREVJRH6PFH555QECMNO3Y/ Ric StevensOne girl who ran to escape returned into danger to help her screaming sister. Fri, 10 May 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Adam Wardle, 38, appeared in the Napier District Court for sentence on two charges of kidnapping and one of assaulting a child. Photo / Paul Taylor
Roadworker dies after being being hit by truck in Remuera, Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/roadworker-dies-after-being-injured-in-remuera-truck-crash/LUS3BC3FGZEATLAOJRIIREYH5I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/roadworker-dies-after-being-injured-in-remuera-truck-crash/LUS3BC3FGZEATLAOJRIIREYH5I/ The circumstances surrounding the crash remain under investigation. Fri, 10 May 2024 06:49:35 +0000 The roadworker who has died was in critical condition after being hit by a truck that rolled down a hill on Victoria Ave, Remuera.
Stolen Mercedes trial: In closing Blenheim crash case Crown says two at fault, defence says one to blame https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crown-says-in-fitting-blenheim-crash-case-it-takes-two-defence-says-only-one-to-blame/YSWQLLVBIFFDHFUNT7QT7NXBMQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crown-says-in-fitting-blenheim-crash-case-it-takes-two-defence-says-only-one-to-blame/YSWQLLVBIFFDHFUNT7QT7NXBMQ/ Tracy NealThe Crown says ‘it takes two’, while the defence says only one person is culpable. Fri, 10 May 2024 06:30:00 +0000 Allister Christie of Blenheim, who died in a high-speed crash in March 2022, and inset of Kyle Clarke, who is accused of driving in a way that led to his death, which he denies. Photo / NZME
picture supplied by family
Man accused of splitting partner’s lip says his goat did it https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-accused-of-splitting-partners-lip-says-his-goat-did-it/62PXRNTGRJEH5E7Y2FIR3HLSPQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-accused-of-splitting-partners-lip-says-his-goat-did-it/62PXRNTGRJEH5E7Y2FIR3HLSPQ/ Hannah BartlettBut, a jury wasn't buying it - defendant guilty of multiple charges. Hamilton woman gets drunk, dances in rain, sets fire to house in ‘spiritual awakening’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamilton-woman-gets-drunk-dances-in-rain-sets-fire-to-house-in-spiritual-awakening/OPE5EYZN45FCROUNKOZVZLP42Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamilton-woman-gets-drunk-dances-in-rain-sets-fire-to-house-in-spiritual-awakening/OPE5EYZN45FCROUNKOZVZLP42Y/ Belinda FeekRaewyn Newport drank two bottles of wine in four hours. Ponsonby shooting: Vigil held for Robert Horne at site of fatal central Auckland incident https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-shooting-vigil-held-for-robert-horne-at-site-of-fatal-central-auckland-incident/OSLA2LHKY5ACFM2BZHXUGML36U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-shooting-vigil-held-for-robert-horne-at-site-of-fatal-central-auckland-incident/OSLA2LHKY5ACFM2BZHXUGML36U/ A long-time friend of Horne said he was "loved by everyone". Myanmar Minister ‘disappointed’ NZ engaged with military officials to Wellington, weeks before Parliament condemned them https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/myanmar-minister-disappointed-nz-welcomed-military-officials-to-wellington-weeks-before-parliament-condemned-them/XXSNE6OKHBCTDGO577TVFMTHLY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/myanmar-minister-disappointed-nz-welcomed-military-officials-to-wellington-weeks-before-parliament-condemned-them/XXSNE6OKHBCTDGO577TVFMTHLY/ Thomas CoughlanA member of Myanmar's exiled Government visited NZ this week.
